## Erc20.totalSupply() method

The total supply for this Token

## Example

```javascript
const balance = await contract.erc20.totalSupply();
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
totalSupply(): Promise<CurrencyValue>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;CurrencyValue&gt;

## Remarks

Get how much supply has been minted
